Organized for the students with an exemplary talent and interest for music, the music club has proven to be a platform for showcasing the sound and vibe of the college through music shows and an extra ordinary band.
With a noticeable number of talented members, the dance club has never failed to define the beat and rhythm of the college with its incredible dance crew. The beautification crew serves its purpose by furbishing the campus with never before seen ideas and innovations. The drama club was organized for the students with similar interests and passion to express themselves in various fields of drama, and the members have excelled themselves with constant practice and perfection. The media team has strived to express the heart and soul of our college to the world and thereby open a portal of opportunities for the students. With a wide range of innovative designs and creations, the design team holds the biggest number of extremely talented members to support its cause. The Mens Hostel is a dormitory providing comfortable accommodation near the campus General Store provides the students with record books
and other supplies necessary for their course. A place in college where food and meals are sold,
 often at a lower than usual price. Central Computing Facility(CCF) is a centralized Computing Centre for the Staff and students of this college. CCF is maintaining and managing the campus networking and Internet facility Where male wards could take admission 
for food and accommodation.
Where female wards could take admission 
for food and accommodation.
Helpful to develop network applications, configure new device etc. The lab is dedicated for computer networking using specialized devices.
 Lab In Charge:Sulfikar.S, Shameer.A.N
Helpful in advanced programming and is useful for the research and development activities of the department.
Priority 1 : 
20% of the total seats should be alloted to students belonging to the categories of SC/ST/PH/BPL/Other States/Government of India Nominees irrespective of semester.
Priority 2: 
The remaining seats after allotment under Priority -1 above , shall be Alloted among the students as follows*
 a) 30% of seats to first year students
 b) 30% of seats to final year
c) 20% of seats to 3rd and 4th years
 d) 10% of seats to second years
 e) 5% of seats to first year PG students
 f) 5% of seats to second year PG students
*(on the basis of merit and distance)
Sports club is successfully running to enhance the spirit of sports and to improve the talents of every GECians. Special coachings are conducting by experts for every students. College has its own cricket team, football team, basketball team, volleyball team and badminton team. Coaching for volleyball, basketball and badminton are given to boys as well as girls. College football team, Basket ball team and volleyball team had proven their spirit and abilities in previous university and inter college matches.
The research laboratories in which the B-tech chemistry students arecarried out in our college are quite well equipped. There is a perfect environment of social, sportive and educational purposes for students to use. It gains exposure to chemical reactions, materials and equipments. So during hand on chemical activities students need to pay immense discipline and should safety deal with lab apparatus and instruments.
